## Storage

- Multiple Access Methods
    - Remote Desktop
    - SFTP
- Scalable
    - If you need more capacity, let us know
- Secure
    - Data is stored in a secure server room, and in UW operated data centers
- Reliable
    - Data is backed up both on and off site
    - Disk redundancy
    - Power redundancy
